title: You guys ever have those games where...
body: You are playing in normal and you start the game by spamming laugh/dance in lane and your lane opponent does too. Then for the next 15 minutes neither of you attacks the other for any reason and you just farm and type jokes in all chat? I just played the most chill game in the history of league because all 5 members of each team started to do this after my lane opponent and I decided to be friends. We would declare in chat what the next objective was and who we were sending to fight for it and the others would just sit mid lane spamming laugh while farming the minions. I couldn't stop laughing the entire game, it was so freaking hilarious.
